extendedInfo.description: Play the first 2 levels for Free ***** Then unlock the full version directly from within the app ***** And enjoy this exceptionaly polished platformer! ***** Don't miss out on this great gameplay experience ***** You will love it too!"Jazz has style, class, and excellent controls, making it one of the best platformers weâve played lately." 4/4 Slide to Play âJazz: Trumpâs Journey hits a lot of great points: gripping platform action, charming art style, and a strong story.â Androidcentral.com âBrilliant start, and the game just gets better from there on in. Fabulous graphics with an absolutely unique and individual style that you will not soon forget.â 90/100 The Smartphone App Review "All of the elements of this game come together in just the right way, and I canât recommend it enough if you like clever platformers." Androidapp.com "From the menuâs to the end credits itâs a highly polished affair." 4/5 Touch Gen--------------------------------------------------âMy name is Trump, Iâm a jazz man, and this is my story.âImmerse yourself in the memories of Trump, in his dreams as a young, star-struck jazz musician, in love with the charming Lady Poppy. Presenting a daring parallel with the real story of Louis Armstrong, relive Trump's life, his quest to form a group, his love affair and battle against injustice in the New Orleans of the early 20th century. Let inspiration guide you through this fascinating platform game.FEATURES- Polished platformer with high quality jazz music! - Beautiful graphics, controls are easy and the gameplay is fun and addicting - Length of play approximately 3 hours, or more!- Move around New Orleans depicted with stylish graphics - Follow young Trump's moving story and be part of the birth of jazz music.- Enjoy the original jazzy soundtrack specially composed by jazz musicians- Use your trumpet to stop time- Brave all the dangers and traps, with bosses, moving platforms, cops, spikes, and much - Play the first 2 levels for Free! then unlock the full version directly from within the app- Facebook/Twitter

reviews.title: Good Game...Great Music!!!
reviews.comment: Simple gameplay with high quality jazz...really good to pass the time.
reviews.author: William.J. Griffin

reviews.title: Creative & Unforgettable
reviews.comment: This game should be an instant Android classic. Lots of great mechanics with an emphasis on puzzle-platforming. It actuqlly has a story and it\'s really interesting. And the music, the music is glorious...if only the game were a bit longer.
reviews.author: Sydney Miles

reviews.title: Purely Amazing
reviews.comment: Very Good Graphics, Controls are easy and the Gameplay is fun and addicting . Not like Most Games on here where it is actually LONG ! Highly recommend it :)
reviews.author: Kevin Baez

reviews.title: Artsy and one of a kind
reviews.comment: This is by far one of the nicest games I\'ve played. The graphics and music are superb.
reviews.author: Claudia Alvis

reviews.title: I lovee jazz!
reviews.comment: I loved the music and the art and the whole game itself! Wish the whole game was free, I really want to finish the game as I listen to the jazz music. And the control pad would be easier to use if you had all four arrows. Nevertheless, I LOVED it. I still have it even though I can\'t purchase it haha.
reviews.author: Sharon Lee

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: So far it has been a great game. However, I can\'t get past the part where I meet the first band member. Everytime I try to continue the story I end up having to go back to the very beginning and that is very frustrating.
reviews.author: Jasmine Clark

reviews.title: From the teaser
reviews.comment: If you like the play style of limbo you will like this game. The controls feel right the concept is different and imaginative. I feel it\'s a bit pricey for $2.99. $1.99 would be the right price point.
reviews.author: Hugo Campano

reviews.title: MY #1 FAVORITE!
reviews.comment: Since I bought this game 9 months ago I have finished the whole adventure 4 times, and now I\'m playing from the beginning for the 5th time. Some levels are too difficult, I can\'t ignore. But still, this is my #1 Android game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A uniquely entertaining platformer
reviews.comment: Great style, great music. The character controls really well, which is pretty important for a platformer. I\'m looking forward to playing through the rest of this.
reviews.author: Jeff Meyerhoff

reviews.title: Forces close
reviews.comment: I can\'t do nothing after the intro. It steady forces close. It look like a fun game but I can\'t play it. Samsung transform ultra.
reviews.author: Shamika Smith

reviews.title: I like it!!
reviews.comment: Vivid graphics, cool concept, innovative theme.  Very well made game!!
reviews.author: Pharoah Cypher

reviews.title: Amazing game with great graphics
reviews.comment: Omg what a great looking game i love the textures and the music goes with the the game play great job devs +1
reviews.author: omar w

reviews.title: Amazing n gr8 music!!
reviews.comment: This is the best game with great graphics n great music I ever play!!!!
reviews.author: nitin tikekar

reviews.title: Superb!
reviews.comment: You can tell a lot of heart went into making this! Well polished with great music and gameplay with impeccable controls for touch. And it has jazz! We need more games like this! A+++!!!
reviews.author: David Prefer

reviews.title: Too many interruptions
reviews.comment: The game takes away control far too often and you can\'t skip the cut scenes. Very annoying and makes it unplayable for me.
reviews.author: Kurt Knudsen

reviews.title: Creative game!
reviews.comment: Just as a warning, this is not a free game, only the first two levels are free. However, I love the atmosphere in this game, it\'s what makes the game worth paying for. They also make use of some creative game mechanics such as time stopping. If you like platform games, definitely give it a go. If you don\'t like platform games, or you\'re already burnt out on them like me, I still recommend you try it just for the atmosphere.
reviews.author: Veronica Smith

reviews.title: Lived it
reviews.comment: I enjoyed the game so much. Love the story line. I just wish that I could have seen the bands performance at the end of the story. Maybe a bit more detail on it. But over all it was a great buy.
reviews.author: Rudy Aceves

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Wonderful visuals, fun game play, relaxing audio! Great game, home run for the develpors and a win for players. Recommend to absolutely everyone!
reviews.author: Sarah Taylor

reviews.title: Fun game but hard
reviews.comment: I played the two free levels and right after i decided to get the full game, it was a little difficult but far from the 6th level when jazz got in jail, Im so stuck on that level, tried finding game walkthoughs and gameplay but never could find it... Gosh, i need help!! :/ idk what to do
reviews.author: Jaylo Mcduffins

reviews.title: Innovative! Amazing!
reviews.comment: Finally, a game that truly captures the essence of a good platformer and story for Android.
reviews.author: Nelson Matthew Nailat
